title: PMMC Deflection
description: Angular deflection equals coil constant divided by spring constant, multiplied by current

title: Voltmeter Multiplier Resistance
description: Series resistance needed for voltmeter with full-scale voltage Vfs and meter resistance Rm

title: Voltmeter Sensitivity
description: Sensitivity in ohms per volt equals inverse of full-scale deflection current

title: Ammeter Shunt Resistance
description: Shunt resistance needed for full-scale current Ifs with meter current Im

title: RMS Voltage (Sinusoidal)
description: RMS value of sine wave is peak divided by square root of 2

title: Average Voltage (Half-Cycle)
description: Average value of sine wave over one half-cycle

title: Form Factor
description: Ratio of RMS to average value; used for scaling average-responding meters

title: Crest Factor
description: Ratio of peak to RMS value; indicates waveform peakedness

title: Thermal Noise Voltage
description: Johnson noise in a resistor; k=Boltzmann constant, T=temperature, R=resistance, B=bandwidth

title: Shot Noise Current
description: Noise from discrete charge carriers; q=electron charge, Idc=DC current, B=bandwidth

title: Signal-to-Noise Ratio
description: Ratio of signal power to noise power expressed in decibels

title: Standard Deviation
description: Measure of spread of measurement values around the mean

title: Standard Error of Mean
description: Precision of the mean value from n measurements

title: Oscilloscope Bandwidth-Rise Time
description: Relationship between oscilloscope bandwidth and measurable rise time

title: Wheatstone Bridge Balance
description: Unknown resistance at balance condition

title: Quality Factor (Inductor)
description: Ratio of reactive to resistive impedance; indicates inductor quality

title: Dissipation Factor (Capacitor)
description: Ratio of resistive to reactive impedance; reciprocal of Q

title: Nyquist Sampling Rate
description: Minimum sampling frequency to avoid aliasing

title: Power in AC Circuit
description: Real power with power factor cos(phi)

title: Combined Uncertainty
description: Law of propagation of uncertainty for independent quantities
